metadata.title: CVE-2023-52563 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/meson: fix memory leak on ->hpd_notify callback The EDID returned bydrm_bridge_get_edid() needs to be freed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
